FuncDef: The display ip large-community-filter command displays detailed configurations of a Large-Community filter. The display ip large-community-filter command displays detailed configurations of a Large-Community filter.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays detailed configurations of a Large-Community filter with a specified name.
The value is a string of 1 to 51 case-sensitive characters. The string cannot be all digits.

ExtraInfo: To check detailed configurations of a Large-Community filter, run the display ip large-community-filter command.
